attributes.action: To issue all Nhs frontline Ambulance personnel to be issued with stab vests for personal protection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are more and more cases reported everyday of Nhs Ambulance personnel being threatened and even abused as they go about their daily tasks.

Does one have to die before action is taken to protect all ambulance staff from the ever growing violence against them.
